mapper.select: select t1.id, t1.account_name, t1.account_state, t1.permissions, t2.id staff_id, t2.staff_num, t2.staff_name, t1.account_secret_email, t2.staff_email, t1.create_time, t3.account_name creat_emp_name, t5.staff_name creater, t1.modify_time, t4.account_name modify_emp_name, t6.staff_name modifier, t1.account_remark from t_account t1 LEFT JOIN t_staff t2 ON t1.id = t2.account_id LEFT JOIN t_account t3 ON t1.create_emp = t3.id LEFT JOIN t_account t4 ON t1.modify_emp = t4.id LEFT JOIN t_staff t5 ON t1.creater = t5.id LEFT JOIN t_staff t6 ON t1.modifier = t6.id WHERE t1.id = #{id}
